Comment: >"you have to go into the media bubble in order to pop it"  metaphoric words like that sound all nice, but literally mean nothing. Dems like Pete suck up to the right-wing, and "play nice" and cordial.   Dems that can *actually* call them on their shit and pop bubbles, *do not* get brought on.
